overview: Zhi is ordered to stay in the bedroom when dad’s colleagues visit, who work in the Family-Planning Commmittee. He wants to say mum but gets a slap in return and continues his “exile”. on his way he is drawn to a mongolian girl and a herd of sheep with mysterious marks. what awaits him in a mongolian yurt is an answer to his origin, under starry sky.
title: The Marked Sheep
